tool_description: With our API you can generate interactive business cards. The card is generated in PDF Base64 format, after which it can be converted to PDF using any programming language. Interactive Business Cards are highly profitable and can be sold to customers, users and more!
name: Digital Business Card
title: Digital Business Card

api_list.name: download-business-card-pdf
api_list.description:
To create an interactive card you can send the following posts:

"email":"youremail@..",
"number_background":"1",
"color_code": "#58D555",
"url_or_base64_img": "https://card4.me/avatar_or_logo.jpg",
"name_or_company":"Micael",
"activity_or_profession":"Programador",
"complete_whatsapp":"123456789",
"complete_phone":"123456789",]
"address":"Street, avenue, local...",
"instagram_url":"https://instagram.com/yourprofile",
"facebook_url":"https://facebook.com/yourprofile",
"youtube_url":"https://youtube.com/yourprofile",
 "site_url":"yoursite here"

If you don't want to send an item, just leave it with "" empty quotes.

The completed items will appear from the interactive card.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://digital-business-card1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "digital-business-card1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://digital-business-card1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "digital-business-card1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
